allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "if \(Test-Path ''$env:USERPROFILE\\.cargo\\bin\\cargo.exe''\) { Write-Output ''Found''; & ''$env:USERPROFILE\\.cargo\\bin\\cargo.exe'' --version } else { Write-Output ''Not found at default location''; Get-ChildItem -Path ''C:\\'' -Filter ''cargo.exe'' -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 3 FullName }")
